text: Grhe abasthanakari marubasiderake bale dinah agamite tomara eka prabala parakranta jatira sathe yud'dha karate ahuta habe. Tomara tadera sathe yud'dha karabe, yataksana na tara musalamana haye yaya. Takhana yadi tomara nirdesa palana kara, tabe allaha tomaderake uttama puraskara dibena. Ara yadi prsthapradarsana kara yemana itipurbe prsthapradarsana karecha, tabe tini tomaderake yantranadayaka sasti dibena.
